type: Legendary Creature – Human Soldier Lord Noble
rules_text:
First strike
[i]Brand of the Exalt[/i] – Lucina can't be blocked by creatures with toughness 3 or greater.
[i]Pair Up[/i] – Whenever Lucina attacks a player, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, draw a card for each player you are attacking this combat, then discard a card.
